Journal.Title: Journal of public health management and practice : JPHMP

Article.ArticleTitle: Putting the Bright Spots of the COVID-19 Pandemic Response to Use.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Author Affiliations: Indiana University Richard M. MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.
